alert.note: Alert for Nelson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued February 08 at 5:39AM EST until February 08 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...Nelson County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility, and icy spots on roads and sidewalks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog and icy spots could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for icy spots on roads and sidewalks.
